summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 7 and the north one-half of Lot 8, Block 42, Addition to the City of Seattle as laid off by D. T. Denny, Guardian of the East of J. H. Nagle (commonly known as Nagle's Addition) with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section to be numbered 2-53.
